FuncDef:
The management-channel mode command sets the management channel mode of a FlexE physical interface.
The undo management-channel mode command restores the default management channel mode of a FlexE physical interface.
By default, the management channel mode is union.
CLIs: management-channel mode { union | section | shim-to-shim | shim-to-shim-op2 }
undo management-channel mode [ union | section | shim-to-shim | shim-to-shim-op2 ]
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To ensure normal communication between the interconnected devices, configure the same management channel mode for the physical interfaces in FlexE mode on the two devices.- Union mode: Management overhead packets occupy overhead blocks 4, 5, 7, and 8 in OH frames.- Section mode: Management overhead packets occupy overhead blocks 4 and 5 in OH frames.- Shim-to-shim mode: Management overhead packets occupy overhead blocks 7 and 8 in OH frames.- Shim-to-shim-option2: Management overhead packets occupy overhead blocks 6, 7, and 8 in OH frames.
Precautions
After clock synchronization enable is onfiguraed on a FlexE physical interface, the management-channel mode shim-to-shim-op2 commnad can not be configuraed.
